name: Children's Fairyland
description: Children's Fairyland is a whimsical storybook theme park on the shores of Lake Merritt in Oakland, designed for children ages 0-8. As one of the first theme parks in America, it has delighted families since 1950 with its enchanting sets, live animals, and puppet shows.
fullDescription: Children's Fairyland is a whimsical storybook theme park on the shores of Lake Merritt in Oakland, designed for children ages 0-8. As one of the first theme parks in America, it has delighted families since 1950 with its enchanting sets, live animals, and puppet shows.
whatTheyOffer:
- EBT/WIC cardholders: $5 admission per person
- Children under 1: Free admission
- Regular admission: $15 per person
- Annual passes available for frequent visitors
howToGetIt: Present your EBT or WIC card at the admission booth. Discount applies to all members of your party. No advance reservation required but recommended on weekends and holidays.
